code: const sampleCrops=[{id:1,name:'Maize',conditions:'Requires well-drained soil and warm temperatures.',regions:['Western Kenya','Rift Valley'],pests:['Fall armyworm','Maize stalk borer'],insights:'Maize is a staple crop in Kenya, widely grown for its versatility and nutritional value.'},{id:2,name:'Tomato',conditions:'Prefers well-drained, fertile soil with consistent moisture and warm temperatures.',regions:['Central Kenya','Eastern Kenya','Coastal region'],pests:['Tomato fruitworm','Whiteflies','Aphids'],insights:'Tomatoes are a popular crop in Kenya, with high demand both locally and for export. sourcesContent:
const sampleCrops = [
  {
    id: 1,
    name: 'Maize',
    conditions: 'Requires well-drained soil and warm temperatures.',
    regions: ['Western Kenya', 'Rift Valley'],
    pests: ['Fall armyworm', 'Maize stalk borer'],
    insights: 'Maize is a staple crop in Kenya, widely grown for its versatility and nutritional value.'
  },
  {
    id: 2,
    name: 'Tomato',
    conditions: 'Prefers well-drained, fertile soil with consistent moisture and warm temperatures.',
    regions: ['Central Kenya', 'Eastern Kenya', 'Coastal region'],
    pests: ['Tomato fruitworm', 'Whiteflies', 'Aphids'],
    insights: 'Tomatoes are a popular crop in Kenya, with high demand both locally and for export. They require careful management to prevent pest and disease outbreaks.'
  },
  {
    id: 3,
    name: 'Cotton',
    conditions: 'Grows best in well-drained soils with full sun exposure.',
    regions: ['Coastal region', 'Eastern Kenya'],
    pests: ['Cotton bollworm', 'Aphids', 'Whiteflies'],
    insights: 'Cotton is a significant cash crop in Kenya, contributing to the textile industry. Proper pest control and irrigation are crucial for high yields.'
  },
  {
    id: 4,
    name: 'Rice',
    conditions: 'Thrives in flooded fields or paddies, requiring a consistent water supply.',
    regions: ['Mwea Irrigation Scheme', 'Ahero Irrigation Scheme', 'Western Kenya'],
    pests: ['Rice blast fungus', 'Stem borers', 'Rice leaf folder'],
    insights: 'Rice is an important staple food in Kenya, with major production in irrigated schemes. It requires substantial water management for optimal growth.'
  },
  {
    id: 5,
    name: 'Coffee',
    conditions: 'Prefers high-altitude regions with well-drained, fertile soil and moderate rainfall.',
    regions: ['Central Kenya', 'Western Kenya', 'Eastern Kenya'],
    pests: ['Coffee berry disease', 'Coffee leaf rust', 'Coffee borer beetle'],
    insights: 'Coffee is one of Kenya\'s major export crops, known for its high-quality Arabica varieties. Disease management and proper pruning are essential for maintaining quality.'
  },
  {
    id: 6,
    name: 'Avocado',
    conditions: 'Requires well-drained soil and moderate rainfall. Can tolerate a range of climates from tropical to subtropical.',
    regions: ['Central Kenya', 'Rift Valley', 'Western Kenya'],
    pests: ['Fruit flies', 'Aphids', 'Avocado thrips'],
    insights: 'Avocado farming is rapidly growing in Kenya, with high demand both domestically and internationally. It is a profitable crop with significant export potential.'
  },
  {
    id: 7,
    name: 'Sugarcane',
    conditions: 'Thrives in well-drained, fertile soils with high rainfall or irrigation.',
    regions: ['Western Kenya', 'Nyanza', 'Coastal region'],
    pests: ['Sugarcane borer', 'Root grub', 'Aphids'],
    insights: 'Sugarcane is a major crop for Kenya\'s sugar industry. Proper irrigation and pest management are vital for achieving high yields and quality.'
  },
  {
    id: 8,
    name: 'Tea',
    conditions: 'Prefers high-altitude regions with well-drained, acidic soils and consistent rainfall.',
    regions: ['Central Kenya', 'Rift Valley', 'Western Kenya'],
    pests: ['Tea mosquito bug', 'Tea thrips', 'Red spider mites'],
    insights: 'Tea is a crucial export commodity for Kenya, known for its high-quality black tea. Sustainable farming practices and pest control are key for maintaining productivity.'
  }
];

export default sampleCrops;
